desc: Local Dog Tshirts feature Local Dog living her best life in the historic towns and scenic islands of South Carolina. Native or novice, transplant or tourist, outdoor enthusiasts and dog lovers rock their passion for the Palmetto State with our soft, ring-spun tees and accessories.

layout.text: Local Dog is the dog that knows where to go in the towns and islands of South Carolina. Featuring nostalgic landmarks in the Lowcountry, Upstate and the Midlands, Local Dog has the softest adult and child tee shirts and accessories that rep your favorite hometown hangouts.
